query.statement:
SELECT A.POSID AS PJT, A.ZSITE_NM AS SITE_NM, B.POSID_1 AS POSID, '' AS HNO, '착공전 실측전송(E/S)' AS MESGTITL, '' AS MESGDESC, B.NAMET AS PMNM, '' AS FRAME_CK,
A.ZMAN AS PERNO1, --'H2018900' AS PERNO1,
VALUE((SELECT X2.KUNNR FROM SAPHEE.VBAK AS X1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBPA AS X2 ON X1.MANDT = X2.MANDT AND X1.VBELN = X2.VBELN WHERE X1.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X1.ZZPJT_ID = A.POSID AND X2.PARVW = 'Z3'), '') AS PERNO2, '' AS PERNO, ('helco' || CAST(#G_USER_ID# AS CHAR(7)) || '@hdel.co.kr') AS USER
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.POSID = B.POSID
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.POSID = #PJT# AND B.POSID_1 = #POSID#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
